en.config.startgenerating: Starting to generate the config.ini file.
en.config.bstartsetup:
Type 1 to start the config setup (recommended) and press ENTER.
Type 2 to use the default config values and press ENTER.
en.config.setup.language: What language should the program be displayed in?
en.config.setup.itemslanguage: What language do you want the Fortnite item names to be in?
en.config.setup.freellamas: Do you want the program to search for free Llamas and open them when they are available?
en.config.setup.recycle.weapons: Automatically recycle Weapon schematics from opened llamas at this rarity or below.
en.config.setup.recycle.traps: Automatically recycle Trap schematics from opened llamas at this rarity or below.
en.config.setup.recycle.survivors: Automatically retire Survivors from opened llamas at this rarity or below.
en.config.setup.recycle.defenders: Automatically retire Defenders from opened llamas at this rarity or below.
en.config.setup.recycle.heroes: Automatically retire Heroes from opened llamas at this rarity or below.
en.config.setup.bskiptutorial: Do you want the program to skip the Save the World tutorial mission if it hasn't been completed on an account yet? You'll receive the StW music pack.
en.config.setup.junkcleaner: Keep your backpack clean by destroying and recycling unwanted items. (More detailed info is available in the Inventory Junk Cleaner menu.)
en.config.setup.junkcleaner2: If you select 1, the program will destroy 1-star items and recycle some of the 2-, 3-, 4- and 5-star stuff.
en.config.setup.junkcleaner3: If you select 2, the program will destroy 1- and 2-star items, and recycle some of the 3-, 4- and 5-star stuff.
en.config.setup.junkcleaner4: And so on. If your accounts are in the Twine Peaks endgame stage and you're using only 5-star items, It's recommended to set this option to 4.
en.config.setup.winterfestgifts: Do you want the program to claim cosmetic rewards from presents during the Winterfest event?
en.config.setup.looptime: Do you want the program to loop itself every X minutes?
en.config.setup.looptime2: Set this to 0 to not loop the program.
en.config.setup.datetime: Do you want the program to show the date and time when sending messages?
en.config.setup.checkupdates: Do you want the program to check for updates on startup?
en.config.setup.dcwebhook: Do you want the program to send its messages to a text channel in your Discord server?
en.config.setup.dcwebhook.values: a webhook url or leave empty to disable.
en.config.setup.skipmenu: Do you want the program to skip the Main Menu?
en.config.setup.skipmenu2: To skip to the main program, set this to 1. To skip to Inventory Junk Cleaner (it will run on all added accounts straight away), set this to 2.
en.config.setup.skipmenu3: If you'll have an issue with an account or want to use other program's features, you can switch it back to 0 in the config file.
en.config.setup.success: The config.ini file was generated successfully. For more options, take a look inside this file.
en.config.readerror: The program is unable to read the config.ini file. Delete the config.ini file and run this program again to generate a new one.
en.config.versionerror: Thanks for downloading the update! The changes made in this version caused your config.ini file to be outdated. Delete the config.ini file and run this program again to generate a new one.
en.authjson.readerror: The program is unable to read the auth.json file. Delete the auth.json file and run this program again.
en.authjson.oldformat: Your auth.json file is in the pre-1.9.0 format, so the program cannot properly read it. To fix this issue, delete it and generate it by running this program again.
en.startup.addaccount.isloggedin1:
Are you logged into your Epic account that you would like the program to use in your browser?
Type 1 if yes and press ENTER.
Type 2 if no and press ENTER.
Type 3 to go back and press ENTER.
en.startup.addaccount.isloggedin2:
Are you logged into your Epic account that you would like the program to use in your browser?
Type 1 if yes and press ENTER.
Type 2 if no and press ENTER.
en.startup.addaccount.authtype:
Which authentication method do you want to use?
Token auth method generates a refresh token to log in. It's recommended if you plan to use only one account.
Device auth method generates authorization credentials that don't have an expiration date, but can after some time cause epic to ask you to change your password. It's recommended if you plan to use multiple accounts.
Available options: token, device.

en.junkcleaner.message:
Inventory Junk Cleaner:

This feature helps keep your inventory clean by destroying and recycling unwanted items. It works by:
- Destroying specific backpack items at the selected star rating and below (perkless traps, weapons/traps from containers/animals, and tiered resources).
- Recycling specific backpack items above the selected star rating (perkless traps and weapons/traps from containers/animals).

The program will NOT affect:
- Items crafted by you or other players
- Weapons and Traps with perks picked up from floor pickups
- Weapons from in-game GiftBoxes
- Ammo/Resources without a tier (Planks, Quartz, Coal, etc.)
- Items in storage or in other backpacks (e.g. Ventures backpack)

Currently selected star rating: {0}. You can change it via the config.ini file.

Metoda logowania Token generuje "refresh token", aby się zalogować. Zaleca się nią, jeśli planujesz korzystać tylko z jednego konta.

pl.junkcleaner.message:
Inventory Junk Cleaner:

Ta funkcja pomaga zachować porządek w ekwipunku, niszcząc i recyklingując niechciane przedmioty. Działa to poprzez:
- Niszczenie konkretnych przedmiotów z plecaka o wybranej liczbie gwiazdek lub poniżej niej (pułapki bez profitów, bronie/pułapki z pudełek/zwierząt i surowce danego poziomu).
- Recyklingowanie konkretnych przedmiotów z plecaka powyżej wybranej liczby gwiazdek (pułapki bez profitów oraz bronie/pułapki z pudełek/zwierząt).

Program nic NIE robi z:
- Przedmiotami wytworzonymi przez Ciebie lub innych graczy
- Brońmi i Pułapkami z profitami, podniesionymi z ziemi
- Brońmi z prezentów zdobytych podczas misji
- Amunicją/Zasobami bez poziomu (Deski, Kwarc, Węgiel, itp.)
- Przedmiotami w magazynie lub innych plecakach (np. w plecaku Wypraw)

Aktualnie wybrany poziom gwiazdek: {0}. Możesz go zmienić w pliku config.ini.
